author: Simon Difford
description: Best described as a strawberry gin sour, the herbal botanicals in the gin combine well with the sweet strawberry.
name: Foxy Lady
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
